sentences.english: However, social is one area it has yet to master.
sentences.chinese: 不過社交網絡仍是網飛尚未攻克的領域。

sentences.english: Pay TV providers pose the larger threat to Netflix.
sentences.chinese: 對於網飛來說，更大的威脅來自付費電視提供商。

sentences.english: Netflix didn't invent any new technology.
sentences.chinese: 網飛公司並沒有發明任何新技術。
